⚡ Lesson 1: What is C++?

⏱️ 15 min | Beginner

What is C++?

C++ is an Object-Oriented Programming language extending C with classes, templates, and modern features. It's powerful for systems programming, game development, and performance-critical applications.

Key Features

  • Object-Oriented
  • Templates (Generics)
  • Standard Template Library (STL)
  • High performance
  • Works with C code

Hello World in C++

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main() {
  cout << "Hello, World!";
  return 0;
}
